scripts.deploy-release: az webapp deployment source config-zip --resource-group risager-dev --name risager-app-dev --src bin/risager-app-release.zip --verbose
scripts.release: npm run build-release && npm run deploy-release
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down --rmi all --volumes && docker system prune -af --volumes
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:clean && docker compose up --build -d
